groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Server
attrs.description: Server for ACME, for example: letsencrypt

attrs.label: Custom ACME Server (Advanced)
attrs.description: This can be used to enter your own custom ACME server

attrs.label: Trusted CABundle for private ACME server
attrs.description: Trusted CABundle for private ACME server, encoded in base64

attrs.label: Email
attrs.description: Email adress to use for certificate issuing must match your DNS provider email when required

attrs.label: selfSigned CommonName
attrs.description: Common name for selfSigned Certiticate Authority

questions.label: Cluster Wide Certificates (Advanced)
questions.description: Creates certificates for use within the entire cluster. Can be used to create wildcard certificates.

attrs.label: Cert-Manager clusterIssuer
attrs.description: One of the Cert-Manager clusterIssuers defined above

attrs.label: Certificate Hosts
attrs.description: NOTE: Creation of wildcard certificates with an ACME issuer requires a DNSO1 solver to be set up.

7.5.2.app_readme:
Certificate management for Kubernetes

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/enterprise/clusterissuer

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
7.5.2.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!

All Rights Reserved - The TrueCharts Project
